To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: orbhunterx@...: Tue, =
27 Nov 2007 20:20:40 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: One from ghostman




Hola=
 Frank!In a nutshell I'd say it's all about the the worst four letter word =
of the english language - Fear.If you couple that with some people's percei=
ved loss of control over the minds and hearts of others, not to mention cut=
ting their profits, it's no stretch of the imagination to see those sort of=
 discussions for what they are. I've read and studied ITC for many years. I=
've long waited for some device, like my friend Ron's now making, to come a=
long for me to actually experiment with. If anything, ITC research points o=
ut the grantedly subjective need for cooperation and harmony among research=
ers, which I've heard is due to the higher levels of vibration in the dimen=
sion some go to after this life.Just find your own place within of peace an=
d tranquility. Bozo's like him only have as much voice and power as we ours=
elves give them. But if you really want to mentally slap onery folks like t=
hat, why not ask them if they're planning another Salem Witch Trial. We all=
 should know just how badly that is now seen, not to mention that Salem's n=
ow witch central of the planet. Law of attraction in action!My dream is to =
help in some way to build a bridge of communication with the otherside, so =
the agony and anguish of loosing love ones can be ended forever. Life is et=
ernal!Keep up the good work Frank, Ron and everyone else!!Lance--- In EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:>> > I'm torque=
d again! I was told yesterday by ------if ya believe that horse crap, that =
what we are getting is 'false communication'. Not only that, that we are on=
ly getting the 'bad guys'. So which is it, false communication, which is no=
 commnunication, or is it evil spirits. To make it worse, this idiot implie=
s he has the backing of the -------, and the church believes we are letting=
 evil into the world. I took this as a severe slap to the face, very insult=
ing to me, and every paranormal researcher in the world. He claims the 'rea=
l voices' he gets are made out of white noise combined with broadcast fragm=
ents. Duffus!! That is exactly the kind of voices the living mind creates t=
o get the voices it wants to hear. Yet only his are the real voices! My old=
 friend, you can take your 'serious session' and your bishop, and shove 'em=
. My apoplogies to the group, but I know this will get forwarded, and this =
bozo finds me so easy to dismiss, that normal e-mail would be useless. I ha=
d to cut some out for nice sakes. Frank-S> ________________________________=
__________________________> Put your friends on the big screen with Windows=
 Vista=AE + Windows Live=99.> http://www.microsoft.com/windows/shop/special=
offers.mspx?ocid=3DTXT_TAGLM_CPC_MediaCtr_bigscreen_102007> 






________=
_________________________________________________________
You keep typing, =
we keep giving. Download Messenger and join the i=92m Initiative now.
http:=
//im.live.com/messenger/im/home/?source=3DTAGLM
